title: stalker00075
author: stalker00075
content: this code Code:import os, binascii, hashlib, base58fullkey = "80"+"7542FB6685F9FD8F37D56FAF62F0BB4563684A51539E4B26F0840DB361E0027C"sha256a = hashlib.sha256(binascii.unhexlify(fullkey)).hexdigest()sha256b = hashlib.sha256(binascii.unhexlify(sha256a)).hexdigest()WIF = base58.b58encode(binascii.unhexlify(fullkey+sha256b[:8]))print(WIF)need "print " compress address pls help....

comments.author: stanner.austin
comments.body: @stalker00075For compressed just add 01 at end.fullkey = "80"+"7542FB6685F9FD8F37D56FAF62F0BB4563684A51539E4B26F0840DB361E0027C" + "01"Also i recommend use good python lib to do this not manually. For example this one https://ofek.dev/bit/

comments.author: stalker00075
comments.body: Quote from: stanner.austin on May 10, 2022, 08:36:24 AM@stalker00075For compressed just add 01 at end.fullkey = "80"+"7542FB6685F9FD8F37D56FAF62F0BB4563684A51539E4B26F0840DB361E0027C" + "01"Also i recommend use good python lib to do this not manually. For example this one https://ofek.dev/bit/thank you very much!
